alert.note: Alert for Jasper; Morgan; Newton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 4:55PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Morgan, northern Jasper and central Newton Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 455 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from Hard Labor Creek State Park to near Starrsville to near Oak Hill, and moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, up to penny sized hail, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Covington, Madison, Porterdale, Rutledge, Newborn, Mansfield, Shady Dale, Stewart, Turtle Cove, Godfrey, Starrsville, Hard Labor Creek State Park, Brick Store, Calvin, Farrar, Eudora, North Alcovy, and Rocky Plains. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for central and north central Georgia.
